mapper.select: SELECT ut.STOCK_ID, s.STOCK_NAME, s.SHORT_CODE, -- 보유 수량 (ut.total_quantity_bought - ut.total_quantity_sold) AS quantity, -- 매수 평균가 (ut.total_purchase_amount / NULLIF(ut.total_quantity_bought, 0)) AS average_purchase_price, -- 총 투자 금액 (ut.total_purchase_amount / NULLIF(ut.total_quantity_bought, 0)) * (ut.total_quantity_bought - ut.total_quantity_sold) AS total_invested_amount, -- 현재가 lsh.CLOSED_PRICE, -- 총 손익 금액 (lsh.CLOSED_PRICE - (ut.total_purchase_amount / NULLIF(ut.total_quantity_bought, 0))) * (ut.total_quantity_bought - ut.total_quantity_sold) AS total_profit_loss_amount, -- 수익률 (%) ((lsh.CLOSED_PRICE / (ut.total_purchase_amount / NULLIF(ut.total_quantity_bought, 0)) - 1) * 100) AS profit_loss_percentage FROM ( -- 유저의 거래 내역을 집계하는 서브쿼리 SELECT p.STOCK_ID, SUM(CASE WHEN p.ORDER_TYPE = 'B' THEN p.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END) AS total_quantity_bought, SUM(CASE WHEN p.ORDER_TYPE = 'B' THEN p.PRICE * p.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END) AS total_purchase_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN p.ORDER_TYPE = 'S' THEN p.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END) AS total_quantity_sold FROM PORTFOLIO p WHERE p.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY p.STOCK_ID ) ut JOIN STOCK s ON ut.STOCK_ID = s.STOCK_ID JOIN ( -- 최신 주식 가격을 가져오는 서브쿼리 SELECT sh.STOCK_ID, sh.CLOSED_PRICE FROM STOCK_HISTORY sh INNER JOIN ( SELECT STOCK_ID, MAX(CREATED_AT) AS MaxDate FROM STOCK_HISTORY GROUP BY STOCK_ID ) ms ON sh.STOCK_ID = ms.STOCK_ID AND sh.CREATED_AT = ms.MaxDate ) lsh ON ut.STOCK_ID = lsh.STOCK_ID WHERE (ut.total_quantity_bought - ut.total_quantity_sold) > 0

SELECT ut.STOCK_ID, s.STOCK_NAME, s.SHORT_CODE, -- 보유 수량 (ut.total_quantity_bought - ut.total_quantity_sold) AS quantity, -- 매수 평균가 (ut.total_purchase_amount / NULLIF(ut.total_quantity_bought, 0)) AS average_purchase_price, -- 총 투자 금액 (ut.total_purchase_amount / NULLIF(ut.total_quantity_bought, 0)) * (ut.total_quantity_bought - ut.total_quantity_sold) AS total_invested_amount FROM ( -- 유저의 거래 내역을 집계하는 서브쿼리 (특정 날짜까지 필터링) SELECT p.STOCK_ID, SUM(CASE WHEN p.ORDER_TYPE = 'B' THEN p.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END) AS total_quantity_bought, SUM(CASE WHEN p.ORDER_TYPE = 'B' THEN p.PRICE * p.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END) AS total_purchase_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN p.ORDER_TYPE = 'S' THEN p.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END) AS total_quantity_sold FROM PORTFOLIO p WHERE p.USER_ID = #{userId} AND p.STOCK_ID = #{stockId} -- 특정 날짜 이전까지의 데이터 필터링 AND p.ORDERED_AT < DATE_ADD(#{endDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY p.STOCK_ID ) ut JOIN STOCK s ON ut.STOCK_ID = s.STOCK_ID WHERE (ut.total_quantity_bought - ut.total_quantity_sold) > 0
